pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identifiability of Linear Structural Equation Models // Provides routines to check identifiability or non-identifiability of linear structural equation models as described in Drton, Foygel, and Sullivant (2011) DOI:10.1214/10-AOS859, Foygel, Draisma, and Drton (2012) DOI:10.1214/12-AOS1012, and other works. The routines are based on the graphical representation of structural equation models by a path diagram/mixed graph.
